## Thoughts About R Compared to Other Programming Lanuage

* What are your thoughts on R vs whatever other software you've used?  

I think R is more directly forward than SAS. 

* What functionality do you like about R?  

The R Markdown combine the word processing and coding together. The project feature allows us to put everything associated about one particular project together.

* What parts do you miss about your other language?  

Python is more powerful on handling big data.

* Do you consider R a difficult language to learn?

No.
